Package persistence.CharacterPersistence

Interface CharacterDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
CharacterDAOAPI, CharacterDAOGSON
public interface CharacterDAO
Interface that calls the method to read and write files on api or json, depend of the classe loaded.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description
    void
    createCharacter(Character character)
    Method that save a unic character in the persistence.

    Method that returns a array of all characters saved.

    method that write a list of characters.

  • Method Details

    • writeAll

      void writeAll(List<Character> character)
      method that write a list of characters.
      Parameters:
      character - a list of type character to write in the persistence.

    • readAll

      Character[] readAll()
      Method that returns a array of all characters saved.
      Returns:
      array list of all characters.

    • createCharacter

      void createCharacter(Character character)
      Method that save a unic character in the persistence.
      Parameters:
      character - a instance of one character that we need to save.

    • removeCharacter

      void removeCharacter(int ind)
      Method that delete a character from persistence.
      Parameters:
      ind - gets a integer of the index of the character that we need to delete.
